//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( "sniper_left", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( "SET_STATIONARY", "OFF" );
	set ( "SET_RELEASE_ONCONTACT", "ON" );

	task ( "walking_one" )
	{
		set ( "SET_TASK", "Path" );
		set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "sniper_one" );
		wait ( 3400.000 );
	}

	dowait ( "walking_one" );

	task ( "walking_two" )
	{
		set ( "SET_TASK", "Path" );
		set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "sniper_two" );
		wait ( 3400.000 );
	}

	dowait ( "walking_two" );
}
